mapper.insert: insert into course (course_code, course_name, course_type, credits, hours, major_id, semester_order, description, created_time, updated_time) values (#{courseCode}, #{courseName}, #{courseType}, #{credits}, #{hours}, #{majorId}, #{semesterOrder}, #{description}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select c.course_id, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.course_type, c.credits, c.hours, c.major_id, c.semester_order, c.description, m.major_name from course c left join major m on c.major_id = m.major_id where c.course_id = #{courseId}

select c.course_id, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.course_type, c.credits, c.hours, c.major_id, c.semester_order, c.description, m.major_name from course c left join major m on c.major_id = m.major_id order by c.course_code
